messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Re: [shinewithunschooling] digests & messages
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/30/2004 9:41:23 AM Eastern Daylight Time, wine_2_water@yahoo.com writes: I am  kind of confused.  I tried to change to the digest version
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/30/2004 9:41:23 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
wine_2_water@... writes:

I am kind of confused. I tried to change to the digest version both here
and at unschooling basics and I am still getting every email. Then over at
unschooling basics, I clicked on NO EMAIL and I still get every message in my
inbox. it says it's been updated but it's not working. Do I need to
unsubscribe and resubscibe to make it go?

Thanks for your help!<<<<

Jonni-Ann

I have had that happen on a couple of lists. I would wait a few days first.
Sometimes it takes Yahoo a few days to catch up to your request, even
though it says that your preferences have been updated.
Pam G
